rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you. See [[WP:FIXNF]] and [[WP:10CR]]

[[Image:Metcard-handyhints.gif|thumb|right|[[Metcard]]]]
  â
[[File:Mykilogo.svg|thumb|right|[[myki]]]]
 
Metro Trains Melbourne currently utilizes the [[Metcard]] ticketing system, alongside the new [[myki]] automated smartcard ticketing system. Metcards and myki are both a time and zone based ticketing system, with validity periods ranging from 2 hours to yearly, and two zones covering the [[Melbourne]] metropolitan area.
